main event: On May 5, 1967, Joseph Mack observed an oval-shaped unidentified aerial object while driving in St. Louis, Missouri.
interesting points: Joseph Mack described the UFO as being approximately 30-40 feet in diameter and silver in color., The object was observed to be hovering before it suddenly accelerated and flew off at high speed., Mack immediately reported the sighting to local police, who then contacted Project Blue Book., The sighting was classified as 'Unidentified' by Project Blue Book due to the object's description and behavior., There were images included in the report, although they were mostly indistinct.
